timeline.title: WWS project initiated by Leo
passages: To support Haachama the World Wide Support for SAIKYO Idol group was founded.
The goal was to show Haachama that fans from all over the world support her.
Haachama should know she is never alone.

timeline.title: Sakazuki joins WWS
passages: To support Leo with his idea Sakazuki joined the WWS team as a staff member.
He is working on graphics and also the contact person for JP Haatons.

timeline.title: Haachama hiatus
passages: As a result of new rules Haachama had to private videos of her Haachama x Haato series
and announced later that she is taking a break for a while.

timeline.title: M.A.S.S. Collab
passages: The WWS team reached out to the Manotomo Alliance Support Squad discord server.
It is known for helping with various fan support projects.
The collab consisted of gathering fan messages and portraying them on a website.
